title: Wouldn’t it be more beneficial for Batman to drive a full-sized van to hold more of his gadgets and devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly, it makes a lot of sense.  Off the top of my head, there are a few different ways he could leverage this: He could have a pretty extensive arsenal of weapons, gadgets, and devices in there if he wanted. He would no longer be limited to what he can carry on his suit or in the much smaller batmobile.He could have something like a mobile command center. Robin could control unmanned devices like drones and such from there.He could use it like a police van and have it be a temporary holding cell to transport criminals to the police station. Batman could make life even easier on the cops if he delivered the criminals right to their doorstep.Honestly, if full-sized vans didn’t have such a weird stigma these days, Batman would probably have a van. Back in the 70’s and 80’s vans were actually cool. I say we lobby DC comics for a Batvan. Who’s with me?
